summary: This document appears to be an email from Jeffrey Epstein discussing a crisis and mentioning new connections at the Treasury. The content suggests a level of involvement with financial matters and relationships with government officials.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing his connections and the ongoing situation.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein on September 19, 2008.
Epstein mentions having new friends at the Treasury, indicating potential financial or political connections.
The email discusses a crisis but does not specify the nature of the crisis.
